name: @skreet/prune-cluster
description: Fast and realtime marker clustering for Leaflet (modified for Skreet)

scripts.build:dist: rimraf ./dist && bun build ./src/index.ts --outfile dist/skreet-prunecluster.js --minify --target browser --format esm && cp src/LeafletStyleSheet.css dist/LeafletStyleSheet.css
scripts.build:dev: rimraf ./dist && bun build ./src/**/*.ts --outdir build --target browser --sourcemap --packages external --format esm && cp LeafletStyleSheet.css build/LeafletStyleSheet.css
